ygData.subject: RE: Suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI those two items only give you 5 STR.  i still wear them both myself.  i have darkmail gauntlets, but have them on my paladin as the elf-hide gloves i feel
ygData.messageBody:
FYI those two items only give you 5 STR. i still wear them both myself. i
have darkmail gauntlets, but have them on my paladin as the elf-hide gloves
i feel are better for a bard. even if i got a haste sash or thick banded
belt to replace the troll-hide i would end up giving it to my in-game
husband, a warrior who could get more use from it. but back to the point of
those two items being 5 STR hehe:

Elf-Hide Gloves 5AGI 5DEX 4AC
Troll-Hide Belt 5STR 5STA 5AC

Shada

> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Since you are hanging out in Guk, try to get your hands on
> the dark elf hide
> gloves and the troll-hide belt. They are bard/rogue only so
> the demand isn't as
> high for them. Those two will give you ten more points to
> your STR. After I
> got those two items I was able to start wearing bronze plate
> and still have room
> to carry stuff.
